default.richtext: Simplify your toolkit instantly with Unicard, giving you access to 40+ design variations ready for No-Code implementation via an exceptionally editor-friendly UI.

children.label: Force full width
children.name: force_full_width_image
children.help_text: This image is already full-width, but with the Force full width option enabled, it will take the full width of the parent element, even if there is extra padding around it.

children.name: heading_text
children.default: The One Content Module for All Your Card Needs!

children.label: Tag
children.name: heading_tag
children.help_text: Semantic heading tag (h1-h6)

children.label: Style
children.name: heading_style
children.help_text: Display different heading styles not related to semantic heading type (tag h1-h6)

children.label: Add icon
children.name: heading_icon_type
children.help_text: Add icon to the heading

children.label: Advanced customization
children.name: heading_additional_customization
children.help_text:
Enable advanced Heading style customization.
***
Use only in rare cases when global heading style is not sufficient.

children.label: Tag
children.name: heading_tag
children.help_text: Semantic heading tag (h1-h6)

children.label: Style
children.name: heading_style
children.help_text: Display different heading styles not related to semantic heading type (tag h1-h6)

children.label: Add icon
children.name: heading_icon_type
children.help_text: Add icon to the heading

children.label: Advanced customization
children.name: heading_additional_customization
children.help_text:
Enable advanced Heading style customization.
***
Use only in rare cases when global heading style is not sufficient.

children.label: Rich text
children.name: richtext
children.default: Simplify your toolkit instantly with Unicard, giving you access to 40+ design variations ready for No-Code implementation via an exceptionally editor-friendly UI. What makes Unicard truly unique are its Flexible Components – choose only the elements you need (like images, text, or CTAs) while unused options stay conveniently hidden, decluttering your view – and its Content Focus, which prioritizes easy content input first by keeping complex styling neatly tucked away until needed.

children.label: Add icon
children.name: add_button_icon
children.help_text: Add icon to the button

children.label: Hide text
children.name: button_hide_text
children.help_text: Hide the button text and only show the icon or image

children.label: Custom text
children.name: custom_text_group
children.help_text: Customizable text. Text that can be used for badges or some unusual typography style.

children.label: Gradient direction
children.name: gradient_direction
children.help_text: Unset any gradient direction to turn off the color gradient style for the text

children.label: Add icon
children.name: list_item_icon_type
children.help_text: Add icon to the list item

children.label: List gap
children.name: list_gap
children.help_text: Space between list items

children.label: Inline
children.name: list_inline
children.help_text: Display list items in a row

children.label: Whole area link
children.name: whole_area_link
children.help_text:
When enabled, the whole area of the module will be clickable as a link.
To make this work, you need to add a link to any of the heading, subheading or button components.

children.label: Card style
children.name: card_style
children.inline_help_text: Customize the card style. You can set the background color, image, and text color.

children.label: Gradient direction
children.name: background_image_overlay_gradient_direction
children.help_text: Unset any gradient direction to turn off the color gradient style for the text

children.label: Gradient direction
children.name: background_gradient_direction
children.help_text: Unset any gradient direction to turn off the color gradient style for the text

children.label: Content gap
children.name: content_gap
children.help_text: General gap between all card components
